values.text: Our Montreal store is open Monday to Friday, 10 am to 5 pm, except statutory holidays.
Unfortunately, we don’t have a store in @sys-location. 🙁 To date, we have stores in Toronto, Montreal, Calgary, and Vancouver.
Our hours of operations are listed on our Hours page.
Our Calgary store is open Monday to Saturday, 9 am to 6 pm, every day except on Christmas.
Our Vancouver store is open everyday, 8 am to 5 pm, except during statutory holidays.
Our Toronto store is open Monday to Saturday from 9 am until 6 pm, except statutory holidays.
